songs.title: Blinding Lights
songs.description: An electrifying synth-pop anthem that pulsates with 80s-inspired beats. Its nostalgic yet modern sound conjures images of neon-lit cityscapes and exhilarating night drives.

songs.title: Starboy
songs.description: A swaggering blend of pop and R&B with futuristic production. The lyrics celebrate The Weeknd's rise to fame while maintaining an edgy and confident vibe. Catchy hooks and a pulsating beat drive the track.

songs.title: Can't Feel My Face
songs.description: A funky pop anthem with infectious hooks and a groovy bassline. Despite its upbeat sound, the lyrics describe the numbing effects of drug addiction, adding depth to the song's seemingly carefree facade.

songs.title: The Hills
songs.description: Dark and brooding, with haunting production and introspective lyrics exploring themes of excess, fame, and the dark underbelly of success. The Weeknd's raw vocals evoke a sense of urgency and longing.

songs.title: Save Your Tears
songs.description: A synth-heavy, danceable track with a melancholic undertone. The lyrics speak of heartbreak and regret, yet the infectious beat and catchy melody create a juxtaposition of sadness and euphoria.

songs.title: Earned It
songs.description: A sensual and sultry ballad with lush orchestration and The Weeknd's smooth vocals. The song's lyrics exude confidence and desire, making it a perfect fit for romantic encounters or intimate moments.

songs.title: Heartless
songs.description: A moody and introspective song with pulsating beats and haunting vocals. The lyrics explore themes of heartbreak and emotional detachment, evoking a sense of numbness and resignation.

songs.title: In Your Eyes
songs.description: An '80s-inspired synth-pop ballad with a catchy melody and romantic lyrics. The song's upbeat tempo and infectious hooks make it irresistibly danceable, while its heartfelt lyrics evoke a sense of longing and desire.

songs.title: Pray for Me
songs.description: A powerful collaboration with Kendrick Lamar, blending elements of hip-hop and R&B with anthemic production. The song's lyrics grapple with themes of faith and redemption, evoking a sense of urgency and determination.

songs.title: Call Out My Name
songs.description: A haunting and emotionally raw ballad with sparse instrumentation and soulful vocals. The lyrics delve into themes of heartbreak and betrayal, conveying a sense of vulnerability and anguish.

songs.title: I Feel It Coming
songs.description: The song encapsulates a mesmerizing blend of R&B, funk, and synth-pop, creating an ethereal and nostalgic atmosphere. The song's smooth melody, pulsating beats, and dreamy vocals evoke a sense of longing and anticipation.

songs.title: Often
songs.description: A provocative and sensual R&B track with infectious beats and hypnotic vocals. The lyrics explore themes of lust and desire, evoking a sense of intimacy and anticipation.

songs.title: Wicked Games
songs.description: A sultry and atmospheric R&B track with moody production and seductive vocals. The song's provocative lyrics and haunting melody create an intense and immersive listening experience.

songs.title: Die for You
songs.description: A heartfelt and emotive R&B ballad with soaring vocals and lush instrumentation. The song's poignant lyrics express unwavering devotion and love, evoking a sense of warmth and sincerity.
